about_the_game:
You have been assigned to this abandoned mental hospital by fate. This hospital has gone through very bad times, and your duty is to treat its highly challenging patients. But be careful, your sanity is at risk…

Do not disturb the spirits of the former patients who have suffered greatly, but know that they will disturb you…

In this adventure full of suspense, horror, and puzzles, you are not alone. Your assistant Sally will help you with everything…


GAME FEATURES:

A puzzle game filled with elements of mystery and suspense.

Features an immersive atmosphere.

Includes dialogues, but most things are conveyed visually in a universally understandable way.

Enter the patient's mind, solve the complexities, and heal the patient.

The demo version includes more than 3 puzzles and mini-games.

The demo includes the sections and puzzles of one patient. Turkish and English language support is available.

Note: The game contains elements of violence and suspense. The demo version will not fully reflect the final state of the game!

With "Transmorphosis," the first game that reflects Bottle Bottom Games' drawing and gameplay style, Bottle Bottom Games aims to bring a new vision to hand-crafted indie puzzle games with a cinematic perspective. We hope you enjoy and love our game as much as we do.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood and violence elements may be seen in the animation scenes of the Transmorphosis demo version.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 630, AMD Radeon HD 6570

short_description: Transmorphosis is a single-player horror and point-and-click puzzle game. You arrive as a doctor at a remote mental hospital where no sane person has been able to stay for long. Can you use your willpower and patience to heal the patients?
